title: 292. Why Hate the Koch Brothers? (Part 1)
description: Charles Koch, the mega-billionaire CEO of Koch Industries and half of the infamous political machine, sees himself as a classical liberal. So why do most Democrats hate him so much? In a rare series of interviews, he explains his political awakening, his management philosophy and why he supports legislation that goes against his self-interest.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
